org.hypergraphdb.viewer.layout.util

Class NodeDistances

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hypergraphdb.viewer.layout.util.NodeDistances

  • public class NodeDistances
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the all-pairs-shortest-paths (APSP) of a set of org.hypergraphdb.viewer.FNode objects that reside in a org.hypergraphdb.viewer.GraphView.
    See Also:
    giny.util.IntNodeDistances

      • NodeDistances

        public NodeDistances(java.util.List<PNodeView> nodesList,
                     GraphView perspective,
                     java.util.HashMap<PNodeView,java.lang.Integer> nodeIndexToMatrixIndexMap)
        The main constructor
        Parameters:
        nodesList - List of nodes ordered by the index map
        perspective - The giny.model.GraphPerspective in which the nodes reside
        nodeIndexToMatrixIndexMap - An index map that maps your root graph indices to the returned matrix indices

    • Method Detail

      • calculate

        public int[][] calculate()
        Calculates the node distances.
        Returns:
        the int[][] array of calculated distances or null if the task was canceled or there was an error

      • getDistances

        public int[][] getDistances()
        Returns:
        the int[][] 2D array of calculated distances or null if not yet calculated
